對象： 全校教職員
標題： 原住民民族學院原住民族研究國際博士班 徵聘專任教師一名 Assistant Professor (or above) in Indigenous Studies
日期： Tue, 29 Oct 2024 11:20:00 +0800

The International Ph.D. Program in Indigenous Studies is seeking a teaching position at the Assistant Professor (or above) level in Taiwan, Austronesia, and Global Indigenous Studies.

To learn more about this opportunity, visit our website: https://ndhu.intl.phd.indigenous-studies.com/careers
